name: Self Control (dragonsploder)
description:
A game were the jump is out of your control.

You play as Ricky, a simple man who wants to get from point A to point B. However, Ricky is not like a normal person, Ricky has a bit of a problem. Much like a sneeze, Ricky jumps uncontrollably, making any journey a hard one.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

R to restart

L to skip level

Game Engine: Godot

Art: Aseprite

Music: GarageBand

Fx: Bfxr

Knowledge: Google

Have fun
